Articles.Content:
You have violated my IP for the last time... AND your check bounced.

I have the police arrest you and send you to prison until there comes a time when you can pay your debts

My Hill of Lawyerly Shenanigans
Do none of you know when to share? From what I've seen, none of you can beat the other. Why not a mutual agreement?
Yes... he gives me 10000 Yen for each use of my IP, and I'll collect.
I steal all your money, convert it to pounds because it is best currency, and buy a gaming PC so I can run MLG games. this attracts MLG pros, who noscope you. hillclan's hill

As per the contract, I will come to the aid of those that have been wronged. I show off my skillz at Gmod's Prop Hunt. This confuses everyone, giving me time to dismantle your PC and extract the raw materials. I then melt them down, and sell them to get the amount of money the PC was originally work, and transfer the money back into Fel's back account.

If you're relying on server mods, then so shall I.

I choose Uber Upgrades. I proceed to go Spy, get 12 levels of firebolt in ubertechs, max out melee attack rate upgrades (it upgrades to 95% on Spy, which is just insane), and stack everything else into enough power for INFINITE FIREBALLS. I AM BECOME MAGICANNON, DESTROYER OF EVERYTHING NOT FIREPROOF. (And since it works off the knife, get too close and I can try to get a backstab)

TF2 is deleted from steam. it is replaced by a MLG game about a chapter of space marines called the dank ravens.

the dank raven's hill.

anti-dank raven scarecrow

'nuff said

my hill.

MLG publishes a terrible game where you can't noscope, they withdraw forces from the hill in order to compensate for the loss of funds.

My hill.
the dank ravens are space marines. I therefore execute you for your heretical ignorance.

Error : 404 comment not found.

Mah hill!

Magicannon, fire.

Now with instant cloak and decloak!

Gentlemen, this hill appears to be mine.
IRS disagrees... Hill is seized due to a fraud investigation and sold to me on a public auction. My legally obtained hill!

Backstab.

My hill.

This is what you get for trying to fight a Spy indirectly.
that person who gave you orders? callidus assassin. my hill.

Garen.

I win.

#NoSkill

I throw a HUGE WHINING FIT and annoy Xannari Ferrows so much that he gives me the hill out of pity

MY HILL! MYNE MINE MYNE!

\*Mute\*

Nice try.

#StillNoSkill

\*Posts images so disturbing that Xannari Ferrows leaves the hill in disgust\*

My hill!

I invade your hill to the tune of Ride of the Valkyries by Richard Wagner. The song itself is so overwhelming and magnificent that it causes you to flee before I fire any artillery.

My hill.

So we're fighting with music huh?

.

MY hill!

What did I just watch, oh dear...

I blast

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lqk4bcnBqls?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 at your hill and it causes you to simultaneously be wowed at the music's splendor, to reflect on its meaning, and think of past and future moments of your life that remind you of it. This causes you to become immobilized from such deep thought, and I take your hill silently.
My hill.

Okay, no more fooling around. I enact a Spacial Isolation Field around wherever this is taking place. The music cuts out, and a dark, deep voice bellows through the halls:

Do any of you know the history of the OgS expanse? It's a fascinating story. It was cause by a chain reaction of unstable Omega and Sigma molecules. Oh, you all know what those are? Well then, I wont bore you with details.

You life forms are weak. Primitive, impure, violent, and blind. Your cluster will be purged of impure life, and why don't I start with you all? A canister of Omega and Sigma molecules is hidden here. With the flick of my wrist, you can kiss your so called Ã¢â‚¬Å“hillÃ¢â‚¬Â goodbye.Every string within this tiny field of the universe, gone. Just like OgS. However...

As an alternative, you can save yourselves by surrendering your territory to me, and banding with me to become purer, more potent life forms. I must warn you though, it wont be easy. You have 10 minutes to confirm your compliance...

I refuse to take part in your witchcraft.

My hill.

Then you shall PERISH!

The bridge holding the molecules apart has collapsed, and they will now fuse with each other; the two most powerful known substances. The nuclei become unstable, and each one collapses, expending the same energy that enveloped the thousands of light years worth of space called OgS, but all contained within a much smaller space, causing a greater effect, and leaving no room for error.

I then proceed back to the moon in which I live, and work on synthesizing more.
